channel.title: Please help i have tried so many times
channel.description:
Okay, how do you take the black box out of the client like, You hit run client play now whatever, Then the client opens and at the bottom of client is a blackbox saying loading models etc.
For example moparscape client when you run at bottom is that blackbox, Well this is like a deltascape client and has that how do you remove it please help i'd really appreciate it.
